---
output:
  bookdown::pdf_book:
    includes:
      in_header: preamble.tex
    keep_tex: yes
    pandoc_args: [ "--csl", "_apa.csl" ] # apa citation style
    latex_engine: xelatex
    pdf_document:
    fig_caption: yes
    number_sections: yes
fontsize: 12pt
linestretch: 1.25
toc-depth: 4
secnumdepth: 4
site: "bookdown::bookdown_site"
documentclass: book
classoption: openany # This removes the blank page after ToC
geometry: "left=4cm, right=3cm, top=3cm, bottom=3cm"
header-includes:
- \usepackage{placeins}
- \usepackage{titlesec}
- \usepackage{amsmath}
- \usepackage{wrapfig}
- \usepackage{caption}
- \captionsetup[figure]{font=scriptsize}
- \usepackage{float}
- \usepackage{subcaption}

subparagraph: yes
bibliography: library/thesis.bib

---

\cleardoublepage
\pagenumbering{gobble}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\fancyfoot[LE,RO]{\thepage}
\renewcommand{\floatpagefraction}{.9} <!-- This specifies that only pages with more than 90% of floats will become a figure only page -->
\setcounter{page}{11} <!-- needs to be adjusted individually depending on size of prebody -->

# Abbreviations {-}

library(knitr)
